GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.96
GSD.description:
net: bridge: vlan: fix memory leak in __allowed_ingress

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.96 by commit 446ff1fc37c74093e81db40811a07b5a19f1d797, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit a580c76d534c7360ba68042b19cb255e8420e987. For more details please see the references link.
